subject: General Science
topic: Prakash ka Pravartan aur uske Niyam (Reflection of Light & Lenses)
question_en: What is the scientific explanation for the reflection of light?
question_hi: प्रकाश की प्रवृत्ति क्या विज्ञानी विधि है।
A_en: When light falls on a mirror, it gets reflected by the mirror surface due to the presence of mirror's silvering or coating. The reflected light follows the same path as the incident light.
